dict.acceptation: 电影；（为决定谁先出牌等）切牌；可被切割；可用于切割；

sent.orig: Is there evidence to demonstrate that V-cut depth and board dimension are well controlled?
sent.trans: 是否有证据证明V-CUT深度和板尺寸有被很好的管控？

sent.orig: Cut is the director's word for stop.
Using UV-CUT crystal quartz glass, the HID xenon light can keep crystal forever!
sent.trans: HID灯使用UV-cut抗紫外线石英玻璃，永保车灯晶莹剔透。

sent.orig: An improvement of graph min-cut based algorithm for calculating the dense disparity mapping is proposed.
sent.trans: 本文提出了一种改进的基于网络图最小截割(min-cut)计算密集视差图的算法。

sent.orig: Compare cut, saw, chop, hack, slash and tear.
